c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.
c1.description: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.descriptionRaw: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.
c2.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.descriptionRaw:
Using a Normal Attack as the second attack of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color>'s Charge Level 1 will perform a follow-up attack.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.
c4.description:
Using a Normal Attack as the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 will perform a follow-up attack.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures With Me
c6.descriptionRaw: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s radius gain a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.
c6.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.
